body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play Sun Titan What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The card text says: whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you *may* return ... (emphasis mine). So I expect a "proceed with may action: yes/no" choice.

Instead, the game forces me to perform the action, without giving a choice. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.35 on Windows 7
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Sun Titan doesn't allow skipping the "may" effect
